Hello!
Thank you for your interest in 7Summits’ offerings on the Salesforce AppExchange.
If you are satisfied with your download, we invite you to review the AppExchange listing so that others may benefit from your experience. And check out our full set of Accelerators, at http://bit.ly/2pk8t80, for even more tools that will enhance the digital experience for your customers, partners or employees.
If you have any questions or feedback for us, please feel free to reply to this email. A member of our product team will respond promptly and address your inquiry directly.
Not finding exactly what you need? Our select listings on AppExchange are just a small sample of the full library of Lightning Bolts, Apps, Flow Actions and Components that we create. Visit 7Summits’ Technology Accelerators page to access a complete listing of all of our offerings. http://bit.ly/2pk8t80
7Summits’ Accelerators help launch new LEX and community experiences faster, drive greater immediate adoption and deliver higher long-term engagement. We welcome the opportunity to showcase our technology prowess, design aptitude and digital transformation expertise to enhance your community experience.
Respond to this email to request a demo or tell us more about your unique community needs.
We look forward to helping you uncover business value!
